entities.name: Ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as asking a question to Ron about his feelings towards Tonks.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being incredulous and sarcastic in response to Ginny's question.

entities.name: Mum
entities.description: Mum is mentioned as trying to put a stop to Tonks' presence.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as asking how Mum can manage to put a stop to Tonks' presence.

entities.name: Tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as being the subject of discussion about her relationship with Bill.

entities.name: Bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as potentially falling in love with Tonks.

entities.name: Fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as being a potential obstacle to Bill and Tonks' relationship.

entities.name: Phlegm
entities.description: Phlegm is mentioned as being compared unfavorably to Tonks by Ginny.

relationships.description: Ginny asks Ron a question about his feelings towards Tonks.
Mum is trying to put a stop to Tonks' presence.
